message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but $100 is still a bit below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $130.
I'm still not comfortable with $130. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer.
I understand you're trying to get a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to compromise at $125, which is closer to my minimum price.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not willing to pay $125. I can do $115, that's the lowest I'm willing to go.
